LanguageData.ARA_HoneyProduction.label: honey can
LanguageData.ARA_HoneyProduction.description: Indicates how much Arachne nectar concentrate this creature stores. If other insect families are starving, the creature with the honey can will try to feed them. When the honey can is full, the creature will try to extract it.
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.label: shell
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.description: This shows the thickness of the Arachne carapace on this creature's body.The thicker the carapace, the more powerful the insect's defenses are.Insects can also peel it off from their own bodies and produce chitin.
